item.title: Top Podcasts 2021
item.description: My Top Ten Podcasts for 2021 Podcasts have exploded in the last few years, and I have no doubt that 2021 will see that trend continue.

item.title: Film Photography
item.description: Of all the artistic mediums that I’ve tried, only one has stuck with me as something that I truly love: photography.

item.title: Spinning Up a Hugo Blog - Part 1
item.description: Or, How I Made This Blog I’ve thought about creating a blog for a while now, but was always hesitant.

item.title: Baby's First Blog Post
item.description: What’s going on here? I write about my interests. As of right now, that is really about the gist of it!
